TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Italic extends System.Windows.Documents.Span

Docs.summary: Provides an inline-level flow content element that causes content to render with an italic font style.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Italic enforces a strong content model for child content. See [TextElement Content Model Overview](../Topic/TextElement%20Content%20Model%20Overview.md) for more information about the Italic content model.
This is the equivalent of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Span> with a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument.FontStyle%2A> value of <xref:System.Windows.FontStyles.Italic%2A> and the two elements can be used interchangeably.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Italic"> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Documents.Inline childInline) cil managed

Docs.param: The initial content of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Italic">.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Italic"> class with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Inline> object as its initial content.

remarks.format:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Documents.Inline childInline, class System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer insertionPosition) cil managed

Docs.param: The initial content. This parameter can be `null`, in which case no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Inline"> is inserted.
The insertion position at which to insert the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Italic"> element after it is created.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Italic"> class with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Inline> object as its initial content, and a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> that specifies an insertion position for the new <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Inline> element.

remarks.format:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer start, class System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer end) cil managed

Docs.param: The beginning of a selection of content that the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Italic"> will contain.
The end of a selection of content that the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Italic"> will contain.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Italic"> class with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> objects that indicate the beginning and end of a content selection that the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Italic"> will contain.
